Author: FeatherMahogany59
Text: I haven’t seen the movie but I think that a lot of French films/books touch on the “sinfully good” lives about the bourgeoisie. I think it kind of displays the ritualistic aspects to show the absurdity of excess and perfectionism. It’s interesting to compare with ED especially because EDs are (at least stereotypically) an upper class problem. I remember reading a book in French class with a really disgusting description of a woman licking mayonnaise off her fingers, followed by another woman drunkenly throwing up everywhere. French stuff is full of all that LOL so gross but also so hard to look away.

Author: nuutuittut
Text: I read the original short story as a teen (with AN) because my mother loved it. I don't remember enough to give you an in-depth opinion, but what I do remember is how uneasy and grossed out it made me feel during those lengthy descriptions of food.
